examples.message: Hi [Instructor's Name], I hope this message finds you well. I'm writing to request an extension for the completion of my course. Due to unforeseen circumstances, I've fallen behind on my coursework. Could you please grant me an extension so I can catch up? Thank you for your understanding.
examples.label: course extension

examples.message: Hello [Instructor's Name], I hope you're doing well. I'm reaching out to request an extension for my course. I've been facing some challenges lately which have affected my ability to keep up with the course schedule. Would it be possible to extend the deadline to allow me more time to complete the assignments? Thank you for considering my request.
examples.label: course extension

examples.message: Hi [Instructor's Name], I'm writing to request an extension for my course. Unfortunately, I've encountered some unexpected difficulties in my personal life which have hindered my progress. I would greatly appreciate it if you could grant me an extension to ensure I can submit my work to the best of my ability. Thank you for your understanding and support.
examples.label: course extension

examples.message: Hi [Instructor's Name], I hope you're doing well. I'm writing to request an extension for my course. I've been dealing with some health issues recently which have affected my ability to focus on my studies. I would be grateful if you could provide me with a bit more time to complete the assignments. Thank you for your consideration.
examples.label: course extension

examples.message: Hello [Instructor's Name], I'm reaching out to request an extension for my course.
